name: Nightcrawler
text: Rapid Teleportation — Action: Spend 1 resource of any type → return a copy of Bamf! from your discard pile to your hand. (Limit once per phase.)

flavor: "Even in dark times, there is beauty and peace to be found."
name: Kurt Wagner
text: Action: Search your deck for a copy of Bamf! and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.)

name: Daytripper
text: Response: After Daytripper enters play, search your deck and discard pile for a copy of Bamf! and attach it to an enemy. Deal 1 damage to each enemy with a copy of Bamf! attached.

name: Kurt's Chapel
text: Kurt Wagner gets +1 REC. Alter-Ego Response: After you make a basic recovery, exhaust Kurt's Chapel and choose a player → that player draws 1 card.

flavor: "I've got two swords: one for each of you!"
name: Kurt's Cutlasses
text:
Counts as 2 restricted cards.
Nightcrawler gets +1 ATK, +1 DEF, and gains retaliate 1.

flavor: Nightcrawler's tail allows him to perform attacks others cannot.
name: Prehensile Tail
text: You can control 1 additional upgrade that has the restricted keyword. Resource: Exhaust Prehensile Tail → generate a [wild] resource for an event.

name: Bamf!
text: Attach to an enemy. Max 1 per enemy. Hero Interrupt (defense): When attached enemy attacks, discard this card → declare Nightcrawler as the defender without exhausting him.

flavor: Nightcrawler can engage several enemies at once by teleporting as fast as he can strike.
name: 'Port and Punch
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Deal 3 damage to each enemy with Bamf! attached.

flavor: "When you look like a demon, it can be tempting to play the part." —Nightcrawler
name: Teleport Drop
text: Hero Action (attack): Discard a copy of Bamf! from an enemy → deal 8 damage to that enemy and stun it.

flavor: "One moment, liebchen — let me make sure it's safe." —Nightcrawler
name: Scout Ahead
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. You may discard a copy of Bamf! from your hand to remove 3 threat from another scheme.

name: 'Port Away
text: Action: Discard a copy of Bamf! from your hand → change forms and ready your identity.

name: Tally Ho!
text: Hero Response (defense): After Bamf! makes Nightcrawler the defender of an attack, return that copy of Bamf! to your hand. Deal 3 damage to the attacking enemy.

name: Rogue
text: Action: Deal 1 damage to another friendly character → until the end of the round, Rogue gains each of that character's [[Traits]] and adds that character's printed THW and ATK to her matching powers. (Limit once per round.)

flavor: "Bad guys aren't so scary when you move faster than they blink."
name: Northstar
text: Interrupt: When a boost card is turned faceup during an attack, deal 1 damage to Northstar → cancel all boost icons ([boost]) on that card.

name: Change of Fortune
text: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Response: After you defeat an enemy during the villain phase, exhaust this card → draw 2 cards.

name: Under Control
text: Attach to a minion. Max 1 per minion. Response: After a hero defends against attached minion's attack and takes no damage, deal 4 damage to attached minion.

name: "Come Get Me, Bub!"
text: Hero Action: Discard cards from the encounter deck until you discard a minion. Put that minion into play engaged with you → heal 3 damage from your identity and give your identity a tough status card.

name: Riposte
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When your hero defends against an attack, it gets +2 DEF for that attack. If you take no damage from that attack, deal 3 damage to the attacking enemy.

name: Astonishing X-Men
text: Victory 0. Response: After an [[X-Men]] character defends against an enemy attack and takes no damage, remove 1 threat from this scheme. When Defeated: Stun and confuse each enemy in play.

name: Gambit
text: X is the number of boost icons ([boost]) on the card under Gambit. Response: After Gambit enters play, look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck and tuck one under him so that only the boost field is visible.

flavor: "Boy, did you ever choose the wrong mutants on the wrong day!"—Cyclops
name: Combine Forces
text: Alliance. Hero Action: Exhaust an [[X-Force]] character and an [[X-Men]] character → defeat a non-[[Elite]] minion.

name: Gunboat Diplomacy
text: Alliance. Hero Action (attack/thwart): Exhaust an [[X-Force]] character and an [[X-Men]] character → remove X threat from among schemes in play and deal X damage among enemies in play, where X is the combined THW of the two exhausted characters.
